players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Alice's death on Night 1 means we have a mafioso among the three of us remaining. We need to be very careful with our vote today since with only 3 players left, one wrong vote could end the game."

You: "Diana is right - we need to be very careful. I think we should share any information we might have. Did anyone notice anything suspicious about Alice before she died? We can't afford to vote randomly."
Charlie: "I have crucial information. As the detective, I investigated Bob last night and discovered he is the mafioso. We need to vote Bob out immediately to win this game."
Charlie: "Bob, you're the mafioso and you know it. Diana, we must vote Bob out now or we lose. Bob will try to manipulate us, but I'm the detective and my investigation proves he's mafia. Trust me!"

You: "Charlie is lying! If he was really the detective, why didn't he share this 'crucial information' in the first round? He's the mafioso trying to frame me. Diana, don't fall for his desperate last-minute claim!"

Diana: "This is a difficult situation. Charlie claims to be the detective with evidence against Bob, but Bob questions the timing of this reveal. Charlie, if you're truly the detective, your investigation should be reliable. I'm inclined to trust the detective claim and vote Bob."
